= Process Information =

== Get environment variables a process uses ==
cat /proc/PID/environ

== Get Logs ==
ls -lha /proc/PID/fd

then cat whatever you are interested in

== Get Processes running == 
pgrep -laf processname
, or
ps aux | grep processname

== Reload a Process without killing it ==
kill -HUP <PID>
kill -USR2 <PID>
